typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		AppId as string,
		Name as string,
		IsPublished as boolean,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		Created as string,
		CreatedBy as string,
		LastModifiedBy as string,
		LastModified as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ContentTypesInput
ContentTypesInput derive(AppId = split(AppId, ',')[0]) ~> AppIdDerived
AppIdDerived sink(input(
		Id as string,
		AppId as string,
		Name as string,
		IsPublished as boolean,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		Created as string,
		CreatedBy as string,
		LastModifiedBy as string,
		LastModified as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> ContentTypes
